abstract: How does Iran view the U.S. killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani? We spoke with several Iranians to get their perspective on a figure both celebrated as a war hero and criticized as a symbol of repressive security apparatus.
lead_paragraph: How does Iran view the U.S. killing of Maj. Gen. Qassim Suleimani? We spoke with several Iranians to get their perspective on a figure both celebrated as a war hero and criticized as a symbol of repressive security apparatus.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
